name: Granite Computer Solutions
tagline: Solving your Computer Support Issues Since 1990.
description:
Since 1990, Granite Computer Solutions Inc. (GCS) has provided managed IT solutions to large and small businesses across all industries in the Greater Phoenix area.
Either by designing a new, stable IT system or relying on existing IT assets, our clients get continuous reliability that allow them to do what they do best – run their business.
Businesses that choose GCS to provide managed IT solutions enjoy a partner that understands that their issues are unique to their business. Our experience and breadth of knowledge ensures that whether those issues are simple or complex, GCS can get the job done right.
Our engineers can respond swiftly and strategically with either remote or onsite service.
So give us a call at (480) 649-7749 or fill out our contact form today and we’ll get started getting you back to what you do best.
